channel.title: Client Errors Thrown - Something Server Sided
channel.description:
So randomly, I get errors like these. Not always the same either. Get them random and packets always freak out on your screen before disconnecting you. Its getting really annoying because I can't find where to fix. Its something to do with packet handling, but I just can't find out what. It is something server sided which is why I am posting here.
[code]Total of 467 Maps added onto the world map! Gfx Amount loaded: 2617 Error: T1 - 139,0 - 36,126 Error: T1 - 54,0 - 139,36 Error: T1 - 116,0 - 54,139 Error: T1 - 55,0 - 116,54 Error: T1 - 7,0 - 55,116 Error: T1 - 216,0 - 7,55 Error: T1 - 153,0 - item.description:

So randomly, I get errors like these. Not always the same either. Get them random and packets always freak out on your screen before disconnecting you. Its getting really annoying because I can’t find where to fix. Its something to do with packet handling, but I just can’t find out what. It is something server sided which is why I am posting here.
